concept.title: AF PGI 5336.9002 Air Force Construction Guide

conbody.p: Contracting officers and all acquisition team personnel involved with SABER contracts should refer to the Air Force Contracting Construction Guide to ensure compliance with regulations and best practices, both prior to and during the acquisition planning phase.
